title: India Contemporary Beachfront Retreat Overlooking Bay of Bengal with Four Restaurants & Pool
description:
Overlooking the tranquil Bay of Bengal, this refined retreat places you steps from the golden sands of Ramakrishna Beach and the scenic promenade of Beach Road. Discover the cityâ€™s cultural gems, including the Submarine Museum and the vibrant stalls of Jagadamba Junction, all within easy reach.

Savour Andhra coastal flavours and multi-national cuisine at The Square, enjoy live music and water vistas at Harbour Vue, or choose from three other exceptional dining experiences located onsite. Indulge in soothing treatments at the wellness spa or take a dip in the shimmering outdoor pool.
